#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t=0;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
            long long int k=0;
            scanf("%lld",&k);
            k--;
            long long int quotient=0,remainder=0,number=0,multiplicand=1;
            quotient=k;
            while(quotient!=0)
            {
                              remainder=quotient%5;
                              quotient=quotient/5;
                              number=number+remainder*multiplicand;
                              multiplicand=multiplicand*10; 
                              //cout<<quotient<<" ";                             
            }
            printf("%lld\n",number*2);
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;             
}
